long_description: let us help you celebrate your special occasion whether its work colleagues, societies, or friends and family. deep in the sussex countryside and on the slopes of the south downs way. findon manor is set in beautiful gardens of more than two acres and offers guests a tranquil country retreat on the outskirts of worthing. all of our bedrooms are individually designed with you in mind and our rates include our famous full sussex breakfast. our restaurant provides the perfect setting whatever the occasion, the snooty fox bar for pre dinner drinks with it's warm, casual atmosphere and the elegant terrace for dining. findon manor is an independent family owned country house hotel.
business_tags: food and drink | hotel restaurants | functions & meetings | funeral reception | private parties | event diary | country retreat | dinner & drinks | function rooms | beautiful gardens | fresh eggs | activity breaks | local suppliers
generated_description: findon manor is an independent, family-owned country house hotel located in worthing, west sussex, england. the hotel is situated in a tranquil setting surrounded by over two acres of manicured gardens, offering a relaxing retreat away from the city. originally built as the village rectory, the hotel has undergone extensive refurbishment to restore its former glory. findon manor provides a range of services including intimate weddings, larger weddings, exclusive use, functions and meetings, and private parties. the hotel features various dining options, including a restaurant, bar, and terrace, all offering a diverse menu and a warm, welcoming atmosphere.
